COMPOSIT (annual technical fest of the department of Metallurgical and Materials Engineering, IIT Kharagpur) I am a graduate (dual degree) from Indian Institute of Technology Kharagpur, enrolled in a dual degree course with B.Teach in Metallurgical and Materials Engineering and M.Tech in Financial Engineering.

projects: [{"title":"Verification of Capital Asset Pricing Model","start_date":"Jul 2016","end_date":"Present","description":"o Project under the guidance of Professor Abhijeet Chandra, Vinod Gupta School of Management, IIT Kharagpuro Used 5 year weekly data from Bloomberg to analyse the actual returns on 50 NSE small cap stockso Calculated betas, risk premium and risk free rate obtained using Country Default Spreads (CDS)o Predicted the returns using Capital Asset Pricing Modelo Compared the actual returns with predicted returns to verify the Capital Asset Pricing Model"},{"title":"Mutual Fund Return Analysis","start_date":"Jul 2016","end_date":"Nov 2016","description":"o Project under the guidance of Professor Somesh Kumar, Department of Mathematics, IIT Kharagpuro Using R programming and MS - Excel, compiled & analyzed the 10-year data of the fund on a daily basiso Analyzed the attributes like financial ratios (Current Ratio, P/B, P/CF, Debt/Equity, etc.) for different sectorso Applied the Multiple Linear Regression Model to predict the Annual Returnso Implemented multicollinearity analysis using Variable Inflation Factor, Eigenvalue, and Singular Value Decompositiono Performed residual analysis using both standardized and studentized residuals.o Formulated a regression model to predict the annual returns of UGPIX with an accuracy of 88%"}]
